it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.view

Class TableViewTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.view.TableViewTest

  • public class TableViewTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This test aims to control all the TableView functionality, to verify if this class can manage all the Controller update messages, like the dice updates, the placement of the cards
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
